name: Queen Regina Z. Bearington's Sticky Situation
name_original: Queen Regina Z. Bearington's Sticky Situation
description:
Made for TOJam 9 by Team Electrified Fooling Machine

Stay close to the maple syrup tsunami to collect as much as syrup as possible, but don't get too close or you'll be washed away!

Programming: Andrew Afan (@atamize)

Art: Daniel Orellana (@_arnulfo)

Design/Research: Emily Claire Afan (@EmilyClaireAfan)

Audio: Patrick Rainville (@RainVillain)
